body_text: I think postGeneration should be defined on the base class as a no-op and let other classes override this. It simplifies this logic, and I think something about performance
body: I think `postGeneration` should be defined on the base class as a no-op and let other classes override this. It simplifies this logic, and I think something about performance
body_html: I think postGeneration should be defined on the base class as a no-op and let other classes override this. It simplifies this logic, and I think something about performance
